content:
# The Stone Furnace has been successfully placed at the coordinates (0, 0). 
# However, the furnace is currently showing a status of "NO_FUEL" and "no ingredients to smelt," indicating that I need to add coal as fuel and iron ore as the ingredient for smelting.

# Step 15: Add coal to the Stone Furnace as fuel and iron ore as the ingredient to start the smelting process.

# First, I will insert coal into the furnace.
insert_into_furnace(furnace_name='stone-furnace', item='coal', quantity=5)  # Insert 5 coal as fuel.

# Next, I will insert iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_into_furnace(furnace_name='stone-furnace', item='iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Insert 10 iron ore for smelting.

# Check the status of the furnace after inserting the items.
print(f"Furnace status after inserting fuel and ingredients: {get_entities()}")  # Display the updated entities to see the furnace status.
